data.title: Asia Market Open: Bitcoin Steadies Around $93K, Stocks Drift After Weak US Prints Reinforce Fed Cut Outlook
data.description: Bitcoin held near $93,000 in Asian trading on Thursday, while regional stocks made a lacklustre start as soft US data reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next week.Nic Puckrin, investment analyst and co-founder of The Coin Bureau, said Bitcoin has staged a “remarkable recovery” over the ...
data.keywords: Kevin Hassett, Nic Puckrin, Bitcoin, Federal Reserve, investment analyst, policy expectations, Coin Bureau
